title: Growth for good?
description: Guntram Wolff invites Bruegel veteran Alessio Terzi to talk about his recently published book ‘Growth for good’, which lays out an agenda to enroll capitalism in the fight against climate catastrophe. With Diane Coyle, they take a deep dive into the book and share their view on the growth or degrowth debate.
itunes:summary: Can economic growth be a force for good and help in the fight against climate change?
itunes:author: Bruegel
dc:creator: Bruegel
